Eric wrote:
> It seems to me it would be relatively easy to distribute batch files
> to run heritrix alongside the unix scripts.  In that spirit, I
> converted the heritrix startup script to a batch file and submitted my
> heritrix.bat to sourceforge as feature request number 1514538.
>
> thanks,
> eric.
>
>   
I added a comment to the issue Eric.
St.Ack
